snippet: On May 11, 1973, Judge William M. Byrne dismissed charges of espionage, theft and conspiracy against Daniel Ellsberg and Anthony J. Russo Jr. for their role in leaking the Pentagon Papers.
abstract: On May 11, 1973, Judge William M. Byrne dismissed charges of espionage, theft and conspiracy against Daniel Ellsberg and Anthony J. Russo Jr. for their role in leaking the Pentagon Papers.

headline.main: May 11, 1973 | Charges Dropped Against Pentagon Papers Leakers
